[She]2162-i stopped , and laid [her]2162-i hand upon [his]2163-his golden head , and then bent down and kissed [his]2163-his brow with a chastened abandonment of tenderness that would have been beautiful to behold had not the sight cut [me]0-i to the heart - for [I]0-i was jealous !

XVIII

" GO , [WOMAN]3858-woman ! "[2162-i]

Then followed a silence of a minute or so , during which [She]2162-i appeared , if one might judge from the almost angelic rapture of [her]2162-i face - for [she]2162-i looked angelic sometimes - to be plunged into a happy ecstasy . Suddenly , however , a new thought struck [her]2162-i , and [her]2162-i expression became the very reverse of angelic .

" Almost had [I]2162-i forgotten , "[2162-i] [she]2162-i said , " [that woman]3450-that woman , [Ustane]172-ustane . What is [she]3450-that woman to [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates - [[his]118-kallikrates servant]4161-his servant , or - - "[2162-i] and [she]2162-i paused , and [her]2162-i voice trembled .

[I]0-i shrugged [my]0-i shoulders . " [I]0-i understand that [she]3450-that woman is [we]4162-we d to [him]118-kallikrates according to the custom of [the Amahagger]171-the amahagger , "[0-i] [I]0-i answered ; " but [I]0-i know not . "[0-i]

[Her]2162-i face grew dark as a thunder - cloud . Old as [she]2162-i was , [Ayesha]114-ayesha had not outlived jealousy .

" Then there is an end , "[2162-i] [she]2162-i said ; ' [she]2162-i must die , even now ! "[2162-i]

" For what crime ? "[0-i] [I]0-i asked , horrified . " [She]2162-i is guilty of naught that [thou]4163-thou art not guilty of [thyself]4163-thou , oh [Ayesha]114-ayesha . [She]2162-i loves [the man]271-the man , and [he]271-the man has been pleased to accept [her]2162-i love : where , then , is [her]2162-i sin ? "[0-i]

" Truly , oh [Holly]109-holly , [thou]4163-thou art foolish , "[2162-i] [she]2162-i answered , almost petulantly . " Where is [her]2162-i sin ? [Her]2162-i sin is that [she]2162-i stands between [me]2162-i and [my]2162-i desire . Well , [I]2162-i know that [I]2162-i can take [him]271-the man from [her]2162-i - for dwells there [a man upon [this earth]3019-this earth]4165-a man upon this earth , oh [Holly]109-holly , who could resist [me]2162-i if [I]2162-i put out [my]2162-i strength ? [Men]516-men are faithful for so long only as temptations pass [them]516-men by . If the temptation be but strong enough , then will [the man]271-the man yield , for [every man]4169-every man , like every rope , hath [his]4169-every man breaking strain , and passion is to [men]516-men what gold and power are to [women]327-women - the weight upon [their]516-men weakness . Believe [me]2162-i , ill will it go with [mortal woman]4172-mortal woman in [that heaven of which [thou]4172-mortal woman speakest]4173-that heaven of which thou speakest , if only the spirits be more fair , for [[their]4172-mortal woman lords]4174-their lords will never turn to look upon [them]4172-mortal woman , and [their]4172-mortal woman Heaven will become [their]4172-mortal woman Hell . For [man]3189-man can be bought with [woman]3858-woman 's beauty , if it be but beautiful enough ; and [woman]3858-woman 's beauty can be ever bought with gold , if only there be gold enough . So was it in [my]2162-i day , and so it will be to the end of time . [The world]252-the world is a great mart , [[my]2162-i [Holly]109-holly]3913-my holly , where all things are for sale to whom who bids the highest in the currency of [our]2165-our desires . "[2162-i]

These remarks , which were as cynical as might have been expected from [a woman of [Ayesha]114-ayesha 's age and experience]2164-a woman of ayesha 's age and experience , jarred upon [me]0-i , and [I]0-i answered , testily , that in [our]2165-our heaven there was no marriage or giving in marriage .

" Else would it not be heaven , dost [thou]4180-thou mean ? "[2164-a woman of ayesha 's age and experience] [she]2164-a woman of ayesha 's age and experience put in . " Fie on [thee]0-i , [Holly]109-holly , to think so ill of [[us]2165-our [poor women]4182-poor women]4181-us poor women ! Is it , then , marriage that marks the line between [thy]4180-thou heaven and [thy]4180-thou hell ? but enough of this . This is no time for disputing and the challenge of [our]2165-our wits . Why dost [thou]4180-thou always dispute ? Art [thou]4180-thou also [a philosopher of these latter days]4183-a philosopher of these latter days ? As for [this woman]1714-this woman , [she]1714-this woman must die ; for , though [I]2164-a woman of ayesha 's age and experience can take [[her]1714-this woman lover]316-her lover from [her]1714-this woman , yet , while [she]1714-this woman lived , might [he]316-her lover think tenderly of [her]1714-this woman , and that [I]2164-a woman of ayesha 's age and experience can not away with . [No other woman]1107-no other woman shall dwell in [[my]2164-a woman of ayesha 's age and experience Lord]4128-my lord 's thoughts ; [my]2164-a woman of ayesha 's age and experience empire shall be all [my]2164-a woman of ayesha 's age and experience own . [She]1714-this woman hath had [her]1714-this woman day , let [her]1714-this woman be content ; for better is an hour with love than a century of loneliness - now the night shall swallow [her]1714-this woman . "[2164-a woman of ayesha 's age and experience]

" Nay , nay , "[0-i] [I]0-i cried , " it would be a wicked crime ; and from a crime naught comes but what is evil . For thine own sake , do not this deed . "[0-i]

" Is it , then , a crime , [oh foolish man]4188-oh foolish man , to put away that which stands between [us]4189-we and [our]4189-we ends ? Then is [our]4189-we life one long crime , [[my]2167-my [Holly]109-holly]3913-my holly , since day by day [we]4189-we destroy that [we]4189-we may live , since in [this world]350-this world [none save the strongest]4192-none save the strongest can endure . [Those who are weak]4193-those who are weak must perish ; [the earth]659-the earth is to the strong , and the fruits thereof . For every tree that grows [a score]4195-a score shall wither , that [the strong one]4196-the strong one may take [their]4196-the strong one share . [We]4189-we run to place and power over the dead bodies of [those who fail and fall]4197-those who fail and fall ; ay , [we]4189-we win the food [we]4189-we eat from out of the mouths of [starving babes]4198-starving babes . It is the scheme of things . [Thou]4199-thou sayest , too , that a crime breeds evil , but therein [thou]4199-thou dost lack experience ; for out of crimes come many good things , and out of good grows much evil . The cruel rage of [the tyrant]4200-the tyrant may prove a blessing to [the thousands who come after [him]4200-the tyrant]4201-the thousands who come after him , and the sweetheartedness of [a holy man]4202-a holy man may make [a nation slaves]4203-a nation slaves . [Man]3189-man doeth this , and doeth that from the good or evil of [his]3189-man heart ; but [he]3189-man knoweth not to what end [his]3189-man moral sense doth prompt [him]3189-man ; for when [he]3189-man striketh [he]3189-man is blind to where the blow shall fall , nor can [he]3189-man count the airy threads that weave the web of circumstance . Good and evil , love and hate , night and day , sweet and bitter , [man]3189-man and [woman]3858-woman , heaven above and [the earth]659-the earth beneath - all these things are necessary , one to the other , and who knows the end of each ? [I]2167-my tell [thee]4208-thou that there is a hand of fate that twines them up to bear the burden of its purpose , and all things are gathered in that great rope to which all things are needful . Therefore doth it not become [us]2166-us to say this thing is evil and this good , or the dark is hateful and the light lovely ; for to other eyes than [ours]2166-us the evil may be the good and the darkness more beautiful than the day , or all alike be fair . Hearest [thou]4208-thou , [[my]2167-my Holly]3913-my holly ? "[2167-my]

[I]0-i felt it was hopeless to argue against casuistry of this nature , which , if it were carried to its logical conclusion , would absolutely destroy all morality , as [we]2166-us understand it . But [her]2167-my talk gave [me]0-i a fresh thrill of fear ; for what may not be possible to [a being who , unconstrained by human law]2168-a being who , unconstrained by human law , is also absolutely unshackled by a moral sense of right and wrong , which , however partial and conventional it may be , is yet based , as [our]2166-us conscience tells [us]2166-us , upon the great wall of individual responsibility that marks off [mankind]985-mankind from the beasts ?

But [I]0-i was deeply anxious to save [Ustane]172-ustane , whom [I]0-i liked and respected , from the dire fate that overshadowed [her]172-ustane at the hands of [[her]172-ustane mighty rival]2170-her mighty rival . So [I]0-i made one more appeal .

" [Ayesha]114-ayesha , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , " [thou]4208-thou art too subtle for [me]0-i ; but [[thou]4208-thou [thyself]4210-thou thyself]4210-thou thyself hast told [me]0-i that [each man]4211-each man should be a law unto [himself]4211-each man , and follow the teaching of [his]4211-each man heart . Hath [thy]4208-thou heart no mercy towards [her]172-ustane whose place [thou]4208-thou wouldst take ? Bethink [thee]4208-thou - as [thou]4208-thou sayest - though to [me]0-i the thing is incredible - [he]4212-he whom [thou]4208-thou desirest has returned to [thee]4208-thou after many ages , and but now [thou]4208-thou hast , as [thou]4208-thou sayest also , wrung [him]4212-he from the jaws of death . Wilt [thou]4208-thou celebrate [his]4212-he coming by the murder of one who loved [him]4212-he , and whom perchance [he]4212-he loved - one , at the least , who saved [his]4212-he life for [thee]4208-thou when the spears of [[thy]4208-thou slaves]4213-thy slaves would have made an end thereof ? [Thou]4208-thou sayest also that in past days [thou]4208-thou didst grievously wrong [this man]4214-this man , that with thine own hand [thou]4208-thou didst slay [him]4214-this man because of [the Egyptian Amenartas whom [he]4214-this man loved]4215-the egyptian amenartas whom he loved . "[0-i]

" How knowest [thou]4208-thou that , [oh stranger]4216-oh stranger ? How knowest [thou]4208-thou that name ? [I]2171-i spoke it not to [thee]4208-thou , "[2171-i] [she]2171-i broke in with a cry , catching at [my]0-i arm .

" Perchance [I]0-i dreamed it , "[0-i] [I]0-i answered ; ' strange dreams do hover about [these caves of [K"r]56-k"r]4084-these caves of k"r . It seems that the dream was , indeed , a shadow of the truth . What came to [thee]4208-thou of [thy]4208-thou mad crime ? - two thousand years of waiting , was it not ? And now wouldst [thou]4208-thou repeat the history ? Say what [thou]4208-thou wilt , [I]2171-i tell [thee]4208-thou that evil will come of it ; for to [him]4214-this man who doeth , at the least , good breeds good and evil evil , even though in after days out of evil cometh good . Offences must needs come ; but woe to [him]4214-this man by whom the offence cometh . So said that Messiah of whom [I]2171-i spoke to [thee]4208-thou , and it was truly said . If [thou]4208-thou slayest [this innocent woman]4218-this innocent woman , [I]2171-i say unto [thee]4208-thou that [thou]4208-thou shalt be accursed , and pluck no fruit from thine ancient tree of love . Also , what thinkest [thou]4208-thou ? How will [this man]4214-this man take [thee]4208-thou red - handed from the slaughter of [her]4218-this innocent woman who loved and tended [him]4214-this man ? "[2171-i]

" As to that , "[2172-she] [she]2172-she answered , " [I]2173-she have already answered [thee]4208-thou . Had [I]2173-she slain [thee]4208-thou as well as [her]4218-this innocent woman , yet should [he]4214-this man love [me]2173-she , [Holly]109-holly , because [he]4214-this man could not save [himself]4214-this man from therefrom any more than [thou]4208-thou couldst save [thyself]4220-thyself from dying , if by chance [I]2173-she slew [thee]4208-thou , oh [Holly]109-holly . And yet maybe there is truth in what [thou]4208-thou dost say ; for in some way it presseth on [my]2173-she mind . If it may be , [I]2173-she will spare [this woman]1714-this woman ; for have [I]2173-she not told [thee]4208-thou that [I]2173-she am not cruel for the sake of cruelty ? [I]2173-she love not to see suffering , or to cause it . Let [her]2173-she come before [me]2173-she - quick now , before [my]2173-she mood changes , "[2173-she] and [she]2173-she hastily covered [her]2173-she face with its gauzy wrapping .

Well pleased to have succeeded even to this extent , [I]0-i passed out into [the passage]1645-the passage and called to [Ustane]172-ustane , whose white garment [I]0-i caught sight of some yards away , huddled up against one of the earthenware lamps that were placed at intervals along [the tunnel]1826-the tunnel . [She]2173-she rose , and ran towards [me]0-i .

" Is [[my]2173-she lord]4128-my lord dead ? Oh , say not [he]4128-my lord is dead , "[2173-she] [she]2173-she cried , lifting [her]2173-she noble - looking face , all stained as it was with tears , up to [me]0-i with an air of infinite beseeching that went straight to [my]0-i heart .

" Nay , [he]4128-my lord lives , "[0-i] [I]0-i answered . " [She]2173-she hath saved [him]4128-my lord . Enter . "[0-i]

[She]2173-she sighed deeply , entered , and fell upon [her]2173-she hands and knees , after the custom of [the Amahagger people]2176-the amahagger people , in the presence of the dread [She]2173-she .

" Stand , "[114-ayesha] said [Ayesha]114-ayesha , in [her]114-ayesha coldest voice , " and come hither . "[114-ayesha]

[Ustane]172-ustane obeyed , standing before [her]114-ayesha with bowed head .

Then came a pause , which [Ayesha]114-ayesha broke .

" Who is [this man]4214-this man ? "[2173-she] [she]2173-she said , pointing to the sleeping form of [Leo]183-leo .

" [The man]271-the man is [[my]2173-she husband]4225-my husband , "[2173-she] [she]2173-she answered in a low voice .

" Who gave [him]271-the man to [thee]114-ayesha for [a husband]1109-a husband ? "[114-ayesha]

" [I]114-ayesha took [him]271-the man according to the custom of [[our]4227-our country]3481-our country , oh [She]2173-she . "[114-ayesha]

" [Thou]114-ayesha hast done evil , [woman]3858-woman , in taking [this man]4214-this man , who is [a stranger]3108-a stranger . [He]4214-this man is not [a man of thine own race]4232-a man of thine own race , and the custom fails . Listen : perchance [thou]114-ayesha didst this thing through ignorance , therefore , [woman]3858-woman , do [I]114-ayesha spare [thee]114-ayesha , otherwise hadst [thou]114-ayesha died . Listen again . Go from hence back to [[thine]4234-thine own place]4235-thine own place , and never dare to speak to or set thine eyes upon [this man]4214-this man again . [He]4214-this man is not for [thee]114-ayesha . Listen a third time . If [thou]114-ayesha breakest this [my]114-ayesha law , that moment [thou]114-ayesha diest . Go . "[114-ayesha]

But [Ustane]172-ustane did not move .

" Go , [woman]3858-woman ! "[114-ayesha]

Then [she]172-ustane looked up , and [I]0-i saw that [her]172-ustane face was torn with passion .

" Nay , oh [She]3858-woman . [I]172-ustane will not go , "[172-ustane] [she]172-ustane answered in a choked voice : " [the man]271-the man is [[my]172-ustane husband]4225-my husband , and [I]172-ustane love [him]271-the man - [I]172-ustane love [him]271-the man , and [I]172-ustane will not leave [him]271-the man . What right hast [thou]172-ustane to command [me]172-ustane to leave [[my]172-ustane husband]4225-my husband ? "[172-ustane]

[I]0-i saw a little quiver pass down [Ayesha]114-ayesha 's frame , and shuddered [myself]0-i , fearing the worst .

" Be pitiful , "[0-i] [I]0-i said in Latin ; " it is but Nature working . "[0-i]

" [I]172-ustane am pitiful , "[172-ustane] [she]172-ustane answered coldly in the same language ; " had [I]172-ustane not been pitiful [she]172-ustane had been dead even now . "[172-ustane] Then , addressing [Ustane]172-ustane : " [Woman]3858-woman , [I]172-ustane say to [thee]172-ustane , go before [I]172-ustane destroy [thee]172-ustane where [thou]172-ustane art ! "[172-ustane]

" [I]172-ustane will not go ! [He]4225-my husband is [mine]172-ustane - [mine]172-ustane ! "[172-ustane] [she]172-ustane cried in anguish . " [I]172-ustane took [him]4225-my husband , and [I]172-ustane saved [his]4225-my husband life ! Destroy [me]172-ustane , then , if [thou]172-ustane hast the power ! [I]172-ustane will not give [thee]172-ustane [[my]172-ustane husband]4225-my husband - never - never ! "[172-ustane]

[Ayesha]114-ayesha made a movement so swift that [I]0-i could scarcely follow it , but it seemed to [me]0-i that [she]114-ayesha lightly struck [the poor girl]2177-the poor girl upon the head with [her]114-ayesha hand . [I]0-i looked at [Ustane]172-ustane , and then staggered back in horror , for there upon [her]2177-the poor girl hair , right across [her]2177-the poor girl bronze - like tresses , were three finger - marks white as snow . As for [the girl]3559-the girl [herself]3559-the girl , [she]3559-the girl had put [her]3559-the girl hands to [her]3559-the girl head , and was looking dazed .

" Great heavens ! "[0-i] [I]0-i said , perfectly aghast at this dreadful manifestation of human power ; but [She]3559-the girl did but laugh a little .

" [Thou]4243-thou thinkest , [poor ignorant fool]4244-poor ignorant fool , "[114-ayesha] [she]114-ayesha said to [the bewildered woman]2179-the bewildered woman , " that [I]114-ayesha have not the power to slay . Stay , there lies a mirror , "[114-ayesha] and [she]114-ayesha pointed to [Leo]183-leo 's round shaving - glass that had been arranged by [Job]137-job with other things upon [his]183-leo portmanteau ; " give it to [this woman]1714-this woman , [[my]114-ayesha [Holly]109-holly]3913-my holly , and let [her]1714-this woman see that which lies across [her]1714-this woman hair , and whether or no [I]114-ayesha have power to slay . "[114-ayesha]

[I]0-i picked up the glass , and held it before [Ustane]172-ustane 's eyes . [She]3559-the girl gazed , then felt at [her]3559-the girl hair , then gazed again , and then sank upon the ground with a sort of sob .

" Now , wilt [thou]3559-the girl go , or must [I]114-ayesha strike a second time ? "[114-ayesha] asked [Ayesha]114-ayesha , in mockery . " Look , [I]114-ayesha have set [my]114-ayesha seal upon [thee]2180-the poor creature so that [I]114-ayesha may know [thee]2180-the poor creature till [thy]2180-the poor creature hair is all as white as it . If [I]114-ayesha see [thy]2180-the poor creature face again , be sure , too , that [thy]2180-the poor creature bones shall soon be whiter than [my]114-ayesha mark upon [thy]2180-the poor creature hair . "[114-ayesha]

Utterly awed and broken down , [the poor creature]2180-the poor creature rose , and , marked with that awful mark , crept from [the room]449-the room , sobbing bitterly .

" Look not so frighted , [[my]114-ayesha Holly]3913-my holly , "[114-ayesha] said [Ayesha]114-ayesha , when [she]114-ayesha had gone . " [I]2182-i tell [thee]2180-the poor creature [I]2182-i deal not in magic - there is no such thing . ' Tis only a force that [thou]2180-the poor creature dost not understand . [I]2182-i marked [her]2180-the poor creature to strike terror to [her]2180-the poor creature heart , else must [I]2182-i have slain [her]2180-the poor creature . And now [I]2182-i will bid [[my]2182-i servants]4248-my servants to bear [[my]2182-i Lord]4128-my lord [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates to [a chamber near [mine]2182-i own]4250-a chamber near mine own , that [I]2182-i may watch over [him]118-kallikrates , and be ready to greet [him]118-kallikrates when [he]118-kallikrates wakes ; and thither , too , shalt [thou]2180-the poor creature come , [[my]2182-i [Holly]109-holly]3913-my holly , and [the white man]4252-the white man , [[thy]2182-i servant]3677-thy servant . But one thing remember at [thy]2182-i peril . Naught shalt [thou]2180-the poor creature say to [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates as to how [this woman]1714-this woman went , and as little as may be of [me]2182-i . Now , [I]2182-i have warned [thee]2180-the poor creature ! "[2182-i] and [she]2182-i slid away to give [her]2182-i orders , leaving [me]0-i more absolutely confounded than ever . Indeed , so bewildered was [I]0-i , and racked and torn with such a succession of various emotions , that [I]0-i began to think that [I]0-i must be going mad . However , perhaps fortunately , [I]0-i had but little time to reflect , for presently [the mutes]1948-the mutes arrived to carry the sleeping [Leo]183-leo and [our]2184-our possessions across [the central cave]1045-the central cave , so for a while all was bustle . [[Our]2184-our new rooms]2186-our new rooms were situated immediately behind what [we]2184-our used to call [[Ayesha]114-ayesha 's boudoir]2187-ayesha 's boudoir - [the curtained space where [I]0-i had first seen [her]114-ayesha]2188-the curtained space where i had first seen her . Where [she]114-ayesha [herself]114-ayesha slept [I]0-i did not then know , but it was somewhere quite close .

That night [I]0-i passed in [[Leo]183-leo 's room]1638-leo 's room , but [he]183-leo slept through [it]1638-leo 's room like the dead , never once stirring . [I]0-i also slept fairly well , as , indeed , [I]0-i needed to do , but [my]0-i sleep was full of dreams of all the horrors and wonders [I]0-i had undergone . Chiefly , however , [I]0-i was haunted by that frightful piece of diablerie by which [Ayesha]114-ayesha left [her]114-ayesha finger - marks upon [[her]114-ayesha rival]2190-her rival 's hair . There was something so terrible about [her]114-ayesha swift , snake - like movement , and the instantaneous blanching of that threefold line , that , if the results to [Ustane]172-ustane had been much more tremendous , [I]0-i doubt if [they]2191-they would have impressed [me]0-i so deeply . To this day [I]0-i often dream of that awful scene , and see [the weeping woman]2192-the weeping woman , bereaved , and marked like [Cain]116-cain , cast a last look at [[her]2192-the weeping woman lover]316-her lover , and creep from the presence of [[her]2192-the weeping woman dread Queen]2194-her dread queen .

Another dream that troubled [me]0-i originated in the huge pyramid of bones . [I]0-i dreamed that [they]2191-they all stood up and marched past [me]0-i in thousands and tens of thousands - in squadrons , [companies]2195-companies , and [armies]2196-armies - with the sunlight shining through [their]2191-they hollow ribs . On [they]2191-they rushed across [the plain]1452-the plain to [K"r]56-k"r , [[their]2191-they imperial home]4255-their imperial home ; [I]2191-they saw [the drawbridges]4256-the drawbridges fall before [them]2191-they , and heard [their]2191-they bones clank through the brazen gates . On [they]2191-they went , up [the splendid streets]4257-the splendid streets , on past [fountains]4258-fountains , [palaces]4259-palaces , and temples such as the eye of [man]3189-man never saw . But there was [no man]3309-no man to greet [them]2191-they in [the market - place]4262-the market - place , and [no woman]386-no woman 's face appeared at the windows - only a bodiless voice went before [them]2191-they , calling : "[2191-they] Fallen is [Imperial K"r]4264-imperial k"r ! - fallen ! - fallen ! fallen ! "[2199-their] On , right through [the city]3964-the city , marched those gleaming phalanxes , and the rattle of [their]2199-their bony tread echoed through the silent air as [they]2199-their pressed grimly on . [They]2199-their passed through [the city]3964-the city and clomb the wall , and marched along [the great roadway that was made upon the wall]2201-the great roadway that was made upon the wall , till at length [they]2199-their once more reached the drawbridge . Then , as the sun was sinking , [they]2199-their returned again towards [[their]2199-their sepulchre]2202-their sepulchre , and luridly [his]2203-his light shone in the sockets of [their]2199-their empty eyes , throwing gigantic shadows of [their]2199-their bones , that stretched away , and crept and crept like huge spiders ' legs as [their]2199-their armies wound across [the plain]1452-the plain . Then [they]2199-their came to [the cave]936-the cave , and once more one by one flung [themselves]2199-their in unending files through the hole into the pit of bones , and [I]0-i awoke , shuddering , to see [She]2206-her , who had evidently been standing between [my]0-i couch and [Leo]183-leo 's , glide like a shadow from [the room]449-the room .

After this [I]0-i slept again , soundly this time , till morning , when [I]0-i awoke much refreshed , and got up . At last the hour drew near at which , according to [Ayesha]114-ayesha , [Leo]183-leo was to awake , and with it came [She]2206-her [herself]2206-her , as usual , veiled .

" [Thou]4265-thou shalt see , oh [Holly]109-holly , "[2206-her] [she]2206-her said ; " presently shall [he]183-leo awake in [his]183-leo right mind , the fever having left [him]183-leo . "[2206-her]

Hardly were the words out of [her]2206-her mouth , when [Leo]183-leo turned round and stretched out [his]183-leo arms , yawned , opened [his]183-leo eyes , and , perceiving a female form bending over [him]183-leo , threw [his]183-leo arms round [her]2206-her and kissed [her]2206-her , mistaking [her]2206-her , perhaps , for [Ustane]172-ustane . At any rate , [he]183-leo said , in Arabic , " Hullo , [Ustane]172-ustane , why have [you]2206-her tied [your]2206-her head up like that ? Have [you]2206-her got the toothache ? "[183-leo] and then , in English , " [I]183-leo say , [I]183-leo 'm awfully hungry . Why , [Job]137-job , [[you]137-job old son of a gun]4266-you old son of a gun , where the deuce have [we]4267-we got to now - eh ? "[183-leo]

" [I]137-job am sure [I]137-job wish [I]137-job knew , [Mr. Leo]108-leo , "[137-job] said [Job]137-job , edging suspiciously past [Ayesha]114-ayesha , whom [he]183-leo still regarded with the utmost disgust and horror , being by no means sure that [she]114-ayesha was not [an animated corpse]2208-an animated corpse ; " but [you]108-leo must n't talk , [Mr. Leo]108-leo , [you]108-leo 've been very ill , and given [us]4267-we a great deal of hanxiety , and , if [this lady]4268-this lady , "[114-ayesha] looking at [Ayesha]114-ayesha , " would be so kind as to move , [I]114-ayesha 'll bring [you]108-leo [your]108-leo soup . "[114-ayesha]

This turned [Leo]108-leo 's attention to [the " lady , "[114-ayesha] who was standing by in perfect silence]2209-the " lady , " who was standing by in perfect silence . " [Hullo]160-hullo ! "[108-leo] [he]108-leo said ; " that is not Ustane - where is [Ustane]172-ustane ? "[108-leo]

Then , for the first time , [Ayesha]114-ayesha spoke to [him]108-leo , and [her]114-ayesha first words were a lie . " [She]114-ayesha has gone from [hence]4269-hence upon a visit , "[114-ayesha] [she]114-ayesha said ; " and , behold , in [[her]114-ayesha place]4270-her place am [I]114-ayesha here as [thine handmaiden]4271-thine handmaiden . "[114-ayesha]

[Ayesha]114-ayesha 's silver notes seemed to puzzle [Leo]108-leo 's half - awakened intellect , as also did [her]114-ayesha corpse - like wrappings . However , [he]108-leo said nothing at the time , but drank off [his]108-leo soup greedily enough , and then turned over and slept again till the evening . When [he]108-leo woke for the second time [he]108-leo saw [me]0-i , and began to question [me]0-i as to what had happened , but [I]0-i had to put [him]108-leo off as best [I]0-i could till the morrow , when [he]108-leo awoke almost miraculously better . Then [I]0-i told [him]108-leo something of [his]108-leo illness and of [my]0-i doings , but as [Ayesha]114-ayesha was present [I]0-i could not tell [him]108-leo much except that [she]114-ayesha was [the Queen of [the country]3308-the country]2210-the queen of the country , and well disposed towards [us]2212-us , and that it was [her]114-ayesha pleasure to go veiled ; for , though of course [I]0-i spoke in English , [I]0-i was afraid that [she]114-ayesha might understand what [we]2212-us were saying from the expression of [our]2212-us faces , and besides , [I]0-i remembered [her]114-ayesha warning .

On the following day [Leo]108-leo got up almost entirely recovered . The flesh wound in [his]108-leo side was healed , and [his]108-leo constitution , naturally a vigorous one , had shaken off the exhaustion consequent on [his]108-leo terrible fever with a rapidity that [I]0-i can only attribute to the effects of the wonderful drug which [Ayesha]114-ayesha had given to [him]108-leo , and also to the fact that [his]108-leo illness had been too short to reduce [him]108-leo very much . With [his]108-leo returning health came back full recollection of all [his]108-leo adventures up to the time when [he]108-leo had lost consciousness in [the marsh]730-the marsh , and of course of [Ustane]172-ustane also , to whom [I]0-i had discovered [he]108-leo had grown considerably attached . Indeed , [he]108-leo overwhelmed [me]0-i with questions about [the poor girl]2177-the poor girl , which [I]0-i did not dare to answer , for after [Leo]108-leo 's first awakening [She]114-ayesha had sent for [me]0-i , and again warned [me]0-i solemnly that [I]0-i was to reveal nothing of the story to [him]108-leo , delicately hinting that if [I]0-i did it would be the worse for [me]0-i . [She]114-ayesha also , for the second time , cautioned [me]0-i not to tell [Leo]108-leo anything more than [I]0-i was obliged about [herself]114-ayesha , saying that [she]114-ayesha would reveal [herself]114-ayesha to [him]108-leo in [her]114-ayesha own time .

Indeed , [her]114-ayesha whole manner changed . After all that [I]0-i had seen [I]0-i had expected that [she]114-ayesha would take the earliest opportunity of claiming [the man [she]114-ayesha believed to be [her]114-ayesha old - world lover]2215-the man she believed to be her old - world lover , but this , for some reason of [her]114-ayesha own , which was at the time quite inscrutable to [me]0-i , [she]114-ayesha did not do . All that [she]114-ayesha did was to attend to [his]108-leo wants quietly , and with a humility which was in striking contrast with [her]114-ayesha former imperious bearing , addressing [him]108-leo always in a tone of something very like respect , and keeping [him]108-leo with [her]114-ayesha as much as possible . Of course [his]108-leo curiosity was as much excited about [this mysterious woman]2216-this mysterious woman as [my]0-i own had been , and [he]108-leo was particularly anxious to see [her]2216-this mysterious woman face , which [I]0-i had , without entering into particulars , told [him]108-leo was as lovely as [her]2216-this mysterious woman form and voice . This in itself was enough to raise the expectations of [any young man]2217-any young man to a dangerous pitch , and , had it not been that [he]108-leo had not as yet completely shaken off the effects of illness , and was much troubled in [his]108-leo mind about [Ustane]172-ustane , of whose affection and brave devotion [he]108-leo spoke in touching terms , [I]0-i have no doubt that [he]108-leo would have entered into [her]2216-this mysterious woman plans , and fallen in love with [her]2216-this mysterious woman by anticipation . As it was , however , [he]108-leo was simply wildly curious , and also , like [myself]0-i , considerably awed , for , though no hint had been given to [him]108-leo by [Ayesha]114-ayesha of [her]114-ayesha extraordinary age , [he]108-leo not unnaturally came to identify [her]114-ayesha with [the woman spoken of on the potsherd]2218-the woman spoken of on the potsherd . At last , quite driven into a corner by [his]108-leo continual questions , which [he]108-leo showered on [me]0-i while [he]108-leo was dressing on this third morning , [I]0-i referred [him]108-leo to [Ayesha]114-ayesha , saying , with perfect truth , that [I]0-i did not know where [Ustane]172-ustane was . Accordingly , after [Leo]108-leo had eaten a hearty breakfast , [we]2219-we adjourned into [She]2216-this mysterious woman 's presence , for [[her]2216-this mysterious woman mutes]2220-her mutes had orders to admit [us]2219-we at all hours .

[She]2216-this mysterious woman was , as usual , seated in what , for want of a better term , [we]2219-we called [her]2216-this mysterious woman boudoir , and on the curtains being drawn [she]2216-this mysterious woman rose from [her]2216-this mysterious woman couch and , stretching out both hands , came forward to greet [us]2219-we , or rather [Leo]108-leo ; for [I]0-i , as may be imagined , was now quite left in the cold . It was a pretty sight to see [her]2216-this mysterious woman veiled form gliding towards [the sturdy young Englishman , dressed in [his]108-leo grey flannel suit]2221-the sturdy young englishman , dressed in his grey flannel suit ; for , though [he]108-leo is half [a Greek in blood]2222-a greek in blood , [Leo]108-leo is , with the exception of [his]108-leo hair , [one of [the most English - looking men [I]0-i ever saw]2224-the most english - looking men i ever saw]2223-one of the most english - looking men i ever saw . [He]108-leo has nothing of the subtle form or slippery manner of the modern Greek about [him]108-leo , though [I]0-i presume that [he]108-leo got [his]108-leo remarkable personal beauty from [[his]108-leo foreign mother]2225-his foreign mother , whose portrait [he]108-leo resembles not a little . [He]108-leo is very tall and big - chested , and yet not awkward , as [so many big men]2226-so many big men are , and [his]108-leo head is set upon [him]108-leo in such a fashion as to give [him]108-leo a proud and vigorous air , which was well translated in [his]108-leo Amahagger name of the " Lion . "[2225-his foreign mother]

" Greeting to [thee]108-leo , [[my]2225-his foreign mother young stranger lord]4272-my young stranger lord , "[2225-his foreign mother] [she]2225-his foreign mother said in [her]2225-his foreign mother softest voice . " Right glad am [I]2225-his foreign mother to see [thee]108-leo upon [thy]108-leo feet . Believe [me]2225-his foreign mother , had [I]2225-his foreign mother not saved [thee]108-leo at the last , never wouldst [thou]108-leo have stood upon those feet again . But the danger is done , and it shall be [my]2225-his foreign mother care "[2225-his foreign mother] - and [she]2225-his foreign mother flung a world of meaning into the words - " that it doth return no more . "[2225-his foreign mother]

[Leo]108-leo bowed to [her]2225-his foreign mother , and then , in [his]108-leo best Arabic , thanked [her]2225-his foreign mother for all [her]2225-his foreign mother kindness and courtesy in caring for [one unknown to [her]2225-his foreign mother]2227-one unknown to her .

" Nay , "[2225-his foreign mother] [she]2225-his foreign mother answered softly , " ill could [the world]252-the world spare [such a man]4274-such a man . Beauty is too rare upon it . Give [me]2225-his foreign mother no thanks , who am made happy by [thy]108-leo coming . "[2225-his foreign mother]

" Humph ! [old fellow]3147-old fellow , "[108-leo] said [Leo]108-leo aside to [me]0-i in English , " [the lady]1072-the lady is very civil . [We]4277-we seem to have tumbled into clover . [I]108-leo hope that [you]3147-old fellow have made the most of [your]3147-old fellow opportunities . By [Jove]165-jove ! what a pair of arms [she]1072-the lady has got ! "[108-leo]

[I]0-i nudged [him]108-leo in the ribs to make [him]108-leo keep quiet , for [I]0-i caught sight of a gleam from [Ayesha]114-ayesha 's veiled eyes , which were regarding [me]0-i curiously .

" [I]114-ayesha trust , "[114-ayesha] went on [Ayesha]114-ayesha , " that [[my]114-ayesha servants]4248-my servants have attended well upon [thee]3147-old fellow ; if there can be comfort in [this poor place]4279-this poor place , be sure it waits on [thee]3147-old fellow . Is there aught that [I]114-ayesha can do for [thee]3147-old fellow more ? "[114-ayesha]

" Yes , oh [She]114-ayesha , "[108-leo] answered [Leo]108-leo hastily , " [I]108-leo would fain know whither [the young lady who was looking after [me]108-leo has gone to]4280-the young lady who was looking after me has gone to . "[108-leo]

" Ah , "[114-ayesha] said [Ayesha]114-ayesha : " [the girl]3559-the girl - yes , [I]114-ayesha saw [her]3559-the girl . Nay , [I]114-ayesha know not ; [she]114-ayesha said that [she]114-ayesha would go , [I]114-ayesha know not whither . Perchance [she]114-ayesha will return , perchance not . It is wearisome waiting on [the sick]4282-the sick , and [these savage women]4283-these savage women are fickle . "[114-ayesha]

[Leo]108-leo looked both sulky and distressed at this intelligence .

" It 's very odd , "[108-leo] [he]108-leo said to [me]0-i in English ; and then , addressing [She]114-ayesha , " [I]108-leo can not understand , "[108-leo] [he]108-leo said ; " [the young lady]1014-the young lady and [I]108-leo - well - in short , [we]4285-we had a regard for [each other]417-each other . "[108-leo]

[Ayesha]114-ayesha laughed a little very musically , and then turned the subject .

XIX

" GIVE [ME]114-ayesha [A BLACK GOAT]4287-a black goat ! "[114-ayesha]

The conversation after this was of such a desultory order that [I]0-i do not quite recollect it . For some reason , perhaps from a desire to keep [her]114-ayesha identity and character in reserve , [Ayesha]114-ayesha did not talk freely , as [she]114-ayesha usually did . Presently , however , [she]114-ayesha informed [Leo]108-leo that [she]114-ayesha had arranged a dance that night for [our]2228-we amusement . [I]0-i was astonished to hear this , as [I]0-i fancied that [the Amahagger]171-the amahagger were much too gloomy [a folk]2229-a folk to indulge in any such frivolity ; but , as will presently more clearly appear , it turned out that an Amahagger dance has little in common with such fantastic festivities in [other countries]2230-other countries , savage or civilised . Then , as [we]2228-we were about to withdraw , [she]114-ayesha suggested that [Leo]108-leo might like to see some of the wonders of [the caves]3307-the caves , and as [he]108-leo gladly assented thither [we]2228-we departed , accompanied by [Job]137-job and [Billali]137-job . To describe [our]2228-we visit would only be to repeat a great deal of what [I]0-i have already said . [The tombs [we]2228-we entered]2232-the tombs we entered were indeed different , for the whole rock was a honeycomb of sepulchres , but the contents were nearly always similar . Afterwards [we]2228-we visited the pyramid of bones that had haunted [my]0-i dreams on the previous night , and from thence went down [a long passage]2233-a long passage to [one of the great vaults occupied by the bodies of [the poorer citizens of [Imperial K"r]85-imperial k"r]4289-the poorer citizens of imperial k"r]4288-one of the great vaults occupied by the bodies of the poorer citizens of imperial k"r . These bodies were not nearly so well preserved as were those of [the wealthier classes]4290-the wealthier classes . Many of [them]2234-these vast caves had no linen covering on [them]2234-these vast caves , also [they]2234-these vast caves were buried from five hundred to one thousand in a single large vault , the corpses in some instances being thickly piled one upon another , like a heap of slain .[4289-the poorer citizens of imperial k"r]

For a long while it puzzled [me]0-i to know what could have been done with the enormous quantities of rock that must have been dug out of [these vast caves]2234-these vast caves ; but [I]0-i afterwards discovered that [it]2235-it was for the most part built into the walls and palaces of [K"r]56-k"r , and also used to line [the reservoirs]4291-the reservoirs and sewers . - [L. H. H.[137-job]

Leo]108-leo was of course intensely interested in this stupendous and unequalled sight , which was , indeed , enough to awake all the imagination [a man]352-a man had in [him]352-a man into the most active life . But to [poor Job]137-job it did not prove attractive . [His]137-job nerves - already seriously shaken by what [he]137-job had undergone since [we]2237-we had arrived in [this terrible country]2238-this terrible country - were , as may be imagined , still further disturbed by the spectacle of [these masses of departed humanity]2239-these masses of departed humanity , whereof the forms still remained perfect before [his]137-job eyes , though [their]2239-these masses of departed humanity voices were for ever lost in the eternal silence of [the tomb]2051-the tomb . Nor was [he]137-job comforted when [old Billali]137-job , by way of soothing [his]137-job evident agitation , informed [him]137-job that [he]137-job should not be frightened of these dead things , as [he]137-job would soon be like them [himself]137-job .

" There 's a nice thing to say of [a man]352-a man , [sir]3126-sir , "[137-job] [he]137-job ejaculated , when [I]0-i translated this little remark ; " but there , what can [one]328-one expect of [an old man - eating savage]4295-an old man - eating savage ? Not but what [I]137-job dare say [he]4295-an old man - eating savage 's right , "[137-job] and [Job]137-job sighed .

When [we]2241-we had finished inspecting [the caves]3307-the caves , [we]2241-we returned and had [our]2241-we meal , for it was now past four in the afternoon , and [we]2241-we all - especially [Leo]108-leo - needed some food and rest . At six o'clock [we]2241-we , together with [Job]137-job , waited on [Ayesha]114-ayesha , who set to work to terrify [[our]2241-we poor servant]1910-our poor servant still further by showing [him]108-leo pictures on the pool of water in the font - like vessel . [She]114-ayesha learnt from [me]0-i that [he]108-leo was one of [seventeen children]2244-seventeen children , and then bid [him]108-leo think of all [[his]108-leo brothers]2245-his brothers and sisters , or as many of [them]2244-seventeen children as [he]108-leo could , gathered together in [[[his]108-leo father]3053-his father 's cottage]2247-his father 's cottage . Then [she]114-ayesha told [him]108-leo to look in [the water]538-the water , and there , reflected from [its]538-the water stilly surface , was that dead scene of many years gone by , as it was recalled to [[our]2241-we retainer]677-our retainer 's brain . Some of the faces were clear enough , but some were mere blurs and splotches , or with one feature grossly exaggerated ; the fact being that , in these instances , [Job]137-job had been unable to recall the exact appearances of [the individuals]2250-the individuals , or remembered [them]2250-the individuals only by a peculiarity of [[his]137-job tribe]2251-his tribe , and [the water]538-the water could only reflect what [he]137-job saw with [his]137-job mind 's eye . For it must be remembered that [She]114-ayesha 's power in this matter was strictly limited ; [she]114-ayesha could apparently , except in very rare instances , only photograph upon [the water]538-the water what was actually in the mind of [some one present]2254-some one present , and then only by [his]137-job will . But , if [she]114-ayesha was personally acquainted with [a locality]2255-a locality , [she]114-ayesha could , as in the case of [ourselves]2241-we and [the whale - boat]3319-the whale - boat , throw its reflection upon [the water]538-the water , and also , it seems , the reflection of anything extraneous that was passing there at the time . This power , however , did not extend to the minds of [others]309-others . For instance , [she]114-ayesha could show [me]0-i the interior of [[my]0-i college chapel]2259-my college chapel , as [I]0-i remembered it , but not as it was at the moment of reflection ; for , where [other people]2260-other people were concerned , [her]114-ayesha art was strictly limited to the facts or memories present to [their]2260-other people consciousness at the moment . So much was this so that when [we]2241-we tried , for [her]114-ayesha amusement , to show [her]114-ayesha pictures of [noted buildings]2261-noted buildings , such as [St. Paul 's]74-st. paul or [the Houses of Parliament]2262-the houses of parliament , the result was most imperfect ; for , of course , though [we]2241-we had a good general idea of [their]2261-noted buildings appearance , [we]2241-we could not recall all the architectural details , and therefore the minutiæ necessary to a perfect reflection were wanting . But [Job]137-job could not be got to understand this , and , so far from accepting a natural explanation of the matter , which was after all , though strange enough in all conscience , nothing more than an instance of glorified and perfected telepathy , [he]137-job set the whole thing down as a manifestation of the blackest magic . [I]0-i shall never forget the howl of terror which [he]137-job uttered when [he]137-job saw the more or less perfect portraits of [[his]137-job long - scattered brethren]2263-his long - scattered brethren staring at [him]137-job from [the quiet water]2264-the quiet water , or the merry peal of laughter with which [Ayesha]114-ayesha greeted [his]137-job consternation . As for [Leo]108-leo , [he]108-leo did not altogether like it either , but ran [his]108-leo fingers through [his]108-leo yellow curls , and remarked that it gave [him]108-leo the creeps .

After about an hour of this amusement , in the latter part of which [Job]137-job did not participate , [the mutes by signs]2265-the mutes by signs indicated that [Billali]137-job was waiting for [an audience]2266-an audience . Accordingly [he]137-job was told to " crawl up , "[137-job] which [he]137-job did as awkwardly as usual , and announced that the dance was ready to begin if [She]114-ayesha and [the white strangers]2267-the white strangers would be pleased to attend . Shortly afterwards [we]2268-we all rose , and , [Ayesha]114-ayesha having thrown a dark cloak the same , by the way , that [she]114-ayesha had worn when [I]0-i saw [her]114-ayesha cursing by the fire over [her]114-ayesha white wrappings , [we]2268-we started . The dance was to be held in the open air , on [the smooth rocky plateau in front of [the great cave]1549-the great cave]2269-the smooth rocky plateau in front of the great cave , and thither [we]2268-we made [our]2268-we way . About fifteen paces from [the mouth of [the cave]936-the cave]1328-the mouth of the cave [we]2268-we found three chairs placed , and here [we]2268-we sat and waited , for as yet [no dancers]2273-no dancers were to be seen . The night was almost , but not quite , dark , the moon not having risen as yet , which made [us]2268-we wonder how [we]2268-we should be able to see the dancing .

" [Thou]114-ayesha wilt presently understand , "[114-ayesha] said [Ayesha]114-ayesha , with a little laugh , when [Leo]108-leo asked [her]114-ayesha ; and [we]2268-we certainly did . Scarcely were the words out of [her]114-ayesha mouth when from every point [we]2268-we saw dark forms rushing up , each bearing with [him]108-leo what [we]2268-we at first took to be an enormous flaming torch . Whatever [they]2274-they were , they were burning furiously , for the flames stood out a yard or more behind [each bearer]2275-each bearer . On [they]2274-they came , fifty or more of [them]2274-they , carrying [their]2274-they flaming burdens and looking like so many devils from hell . [Leo]108-leo was the first to discover what these burdens were .

" [Great heaven]4296-great heaven ! "[108-leo] [he]108-leo said , " [they]2274-they are corpses on fire ! "[108-leo]

[I]0-i stared and stared again - [he]108-leo was perfectly right - the torches that were to light [our]2268-we entertainment were [human mummies from [the caves]3307-the caves]2276-human mummies from the caves !

On rushed the bearers of the flaming corpses , and , meeting at a spot about twenty paces in front of [us]2268-we , built [their]2274-they ghastly burdens crossways into a huge bonfire . Heavens ! how [they]2274-they roared and flared ! No tar barrel could have burnt as [those mummies]2278-those mummies did . Nor was this all . Suddenly [I]0-i saw [one great fellow]2279-one great fellow seize a flaming human arm that had fallen from its parent frame , and rush off into the darkness . Presently [he]2279-one great fellow stopped , and a tall streak of fire shot up into the air , illumining the gloom , and also the lamp from which it sprang . That lamp was the mummy of [a woman tied to a stout stake let into the rock]2280-a woman tied to a stout stake let into the rock , and [he]2279-one great fellow had fired [her]2280-a woman tied to a stout stake let into the rock hair . On [he]2279-one great fellow went a few paces and touched a second , then a third , and a fourth , till at last [we]2268-we were surrounded on all three sides by a great ring of bodies flaring furiously , the material with which [they]2274-they were preserved having rendered [them]2274-they so inflammable that the flames would literally spout out of the ears and mouth in tongues of fire a foot or more in length .

[Nero]225-nero illuminated [[his]225-nero gardens]2281-his gardens with live Christians soaked in tar , and [we]2268-we were now treated to a similar spectacle , probably for the first time since [his]225-nero day , only happily [our]2268-we lamps were not living ones .

But , although this element of horror was fortunately wanting , to describe the awful and hideous grandeur of the spectacle thus presented to [us]2268-we is , [I]0-i feel , so absolutely beyond [my]0-i poor powers that [I]0-i scarcely dare attempt it . To begin with , it appealed to the moral as well as the physical susceptibilities . There was something very terrible , and yet very fascinating , about the employment of the remote dead to illumine the orgies of [the living]1055-the living ; in itself the thing was a satire , both on [the living]1055-the living and the dead . [Cæsar]226-cæsar 's dust - or is it [Alexander]227-alexander 's ? - may stop a bunghole , but the functions of [these dead Cæsars of the past]2284-these dead cæsars of the past was to light up a savage fetish dance . To such base uses may [we]2268-we come , of so little account may [we]2268-we be in the minds of the eager multitudes that [we]2268-we shall breed , many of whom , so far from revering [our]2268-we memory , will live to curse [us]2268-we for begetting [them]2284-these dead cæsars of the past into such a world of woe .

Then there was the physical side of the spectacle , and a weird and splendid one it was . [Those old citizens of [K"r]56-k"r]4297-those old citizens of k"r burnt as , to judge from [their]4297-those old citizens of k"r sculptures and inscriptions , [they]4297-those old citizens of k"r had lived , very fast , and with the utmost liberality . What is more , there were plenty of [them]4297-those old citizens of k"r . As soon as ever a mummy had burnt down to the ankles , which [it]4298-it did in about twenty minutes , the feet were kicked away , and another one put in its place . The bonfire was kept going on the same generous scale , and its flames shot up , with a hiss and a crackle , twenty or thirty feet into the air , throwing great flashes of light far out into the gloom , through which the dark forms of [the Amahagger]171-the amahagger flitted to and fro like devils replenishing the infernal fires . [We]2268-we all stood and stared aghast - shocked , and yet fascinated at so strange a spectacle , and half expecting to see [the spirits those flaming forms]4299-the spirits those flaming forms had once enclosed come creeping from the shadows to work vengeance on [[their]2284-these dead cæsars of the past desecrators]4300-their desecrators .[114-ayesha]

" [I]114-ayesha promised [thee]4301-thee a strange sight , [[my]114-ayesha Holly]3913-my holly , "[114-ayesha] laughed [Ayesha]114-ayesha , whose nerves alone did not seem to be affected ; " and , behold , [I]114-ayesha have not failed [thee]4301-thee . Also , it hath its lesson . Trust not to the future , for who knows what the future may bring ! Therefore , live for the day , and endeavour not to escape the dust which seems to be [man]3189-man 's end . What thinkest [thou]4304-thou [those long - forgotten nobles]4305-those long - forgotten nobles and [ladies]4306-ladies would have felt had [they]4305-those long - forgotten nobles known that [they]4305-those long - forgotten nobles should one day flare to light the dance or boil the pot of [savages]3343-savages ? But see , here come [the dancers]4308-the dancers ; [a merry crew]4309-a merry crew - are [they]4308-the dancers not ? The stage is lit - now for the play . "[114-ayesha]

As [she]114-ayesha spoke , [we]2285-us perceived two lines of figures , [one male]2286-one male and [the other female]2287-the other female , to the number of about a hundred , each advancing round the human bonfire , arrayed only in the usual leopard and buck skins . [They]2288-they formed up , in perfect silence , in two lines , facing each other between [us]2285-us and the fire , and then the dance - a sort of infernal and fiendish cancan - began . To describe it is quite impossible , but , though there was a good deal of tossing of legs and double - shuffling , it seemed to [our]2285-us untutored minds to be more of a play than a dance , and , as usual with [this dreadful people]2289-this dreadful people , whose minds seem to have taken [their]2289-this dreadful people colour from the caves in which [they]2289-this dreadful people live , and whose jokes and amusements are drawn from the inexhaustible stores of preserved mortality with which [they]2289-this dreadful people share [[their]2289-this dreadful people homes]2290-their homes , the subject appeared to be a most ghastly one . [I]0-i know that it represented an attempted murder first of all , and then the burial alive of [the victim]1206-the victim and [his]1206-the victim struggling from the grave ; each act of the abominable drama , which was carried on in perfect silence , being rounded off and finished with a furious and most revolting dance round [the supposed victim , who writhed upon the ground in the red light of the bonfire]2292-the supposed victim , who writhed upon the ground in the red light of the bonfire .

Presently , however , this pleasing piece was interrupted . Suddenly there was a slight commotion , and [a large powerful woman]2293-a large powerful woman , whom [I]0-i had noted as [one of the most vigorous of [the dancers]4308-the dancers]2294-one of the most vigorous of the dancers , came , made mad and drunken with unholy excitement , bounding and staggering towards [us]2285-us , shrieking out as [she]2293-a large powerful woman came : -

" [I]2293-a large powerful woman want [a Black Goat]4287-a black goat , [I]2293-a large powerful woman must have [a Black Goat]4287-a black goat , bring [me]2293-a large powerful woman [a Black Goat]4287-a black goat ! "[2293-a large powerful woman] and down [she]2293-a large powerful woman fell upon the rocky floor foaming and writhing , and shrieking for a Black Goat , about as hideous a spectacle as can well be conceived .

Instantly [most of [the dancers]4308-the dancers]2296-most of the dancers came up and got round [her]2293-a large powerful woman , though some still continued [their]2296-most of the dancers capers in the background .

" [She]2293-a large powerful woman has got [a Devil]4313-a devil , "[2298-one of them] called out [one of [them]4308-the dancers]2298-one of them . " Run and get a black goat . There , [Devil]228-devil , keep quiet ! keep quiet ! [You]228-devil shall have the goat presently . [They]4308-the dancers have gone to fetch it , [Devil]228-devil . "[2298-one of them]

" [I]2299-the foaming rolling creature want [a Black Goat]4287-a black goat , [I]2299-the foaming rolling creature must have [a Black Goat]4287-a black goat ! "[2299-the foaming rolling creature] shrieked [the foaming rolling creature]2299-the foaming rolling creature again .

" All right , [Devil]228-devil , the goat will be here presently ; keep quiet , there 's [a good Devil]4316-a good devil ! "[2299-the foaming rolling creature]

And so on till the goat , taken from a neighbouring kraal , did at last arrive , being dragged bleating on to the scene by its horns .

" Is it [a Black One]3378-a black one , is it [a Black One]3378-a black one ? "[2300-the possessed] shrieked [the possessed]2300-the possessed .

" Yes , yes , [Devil]228-devil , as black as night ; "[2298-one of them] then aside , " keep it behind [thee]228-devil , do n't let [the Devil]228-devil see that it has got a white spot on [its]4287-a black goat rump and another on its belly . In one minute , [Devil]228-devil . There , cut [his]4287-a black goat throat quick . Where is the saucer ? "[2298-one of them]

" The Goat ! [the Goat]4319-the goat ! [the Goat]4319-the goat ! Give [me]2299-the foaming rolling creature the blood of [my]2299-the foaming rolling creature black goat ! [I]2299-the foaming rolling creature must have it , do n't [you]284-a woman see [I]2299-the foaming rolling creature must have it ? Oh ! oh ! oh ! give [me]2299-the foaming rolling creature the blood of the goat . "[2299-the foaming rolling creature]

At this moment [a terrified bah !]2301-a terrified bah ! announced that the poor goat had been sacrificed , and the next minute [a woman]284-a woman ran up with a saucer full of blood . This the possessed creature , who was then raving and foaming [her]284-a woman wildest , seized and drank , and was instantly recovered , and without a trace of hysteria , or fits , or being possessed , or whatever dreadful thing it was [she]284-a woman was suffering from . [She]284-a woman stretched [her]284-a woman arms , smiled faintly , and walked quietly back to [the dancers]4308-the dancers , who presently withdrew in a double line as [they]4308-the dancers had come , leaving the space between [us]2304-we and the bonfire deserted .

[I]0-i thought that the entertainment was now over , and , feeling rather queer , was about to ask [She]284-a woman if [we]2304-we could rise , when suddenly what at first [I]0-i took to be [a baboon]2305-a baboon came hopping round the fire , and was instantly met upon the other side by a lion , or rather [a human being dressed in a lion]2306-a human being dressed in a lion 's skin . Then came a goat , then [a man wrapped in an ox]2307-a man wrapped in an ox 's hide , with the horns wobbling about in a ludicrous way . After [him]2307-a man wrapped in an ox followed a blesbok , then an impala , then a koodoo , then more goats , and many other animals , including [a girl sewn up in the shining scaly hide of a boa - constrictor]2308-a girl sewn up in the shining scaly hide of a boa - constrictor , several yards of which trailed along the ground behind [her]284-a woman . When all the beasts had collected [they]2309-they began to dance about in a lumbering , unnatural fashion , and to imitate the sounds produced by the respective animals [they]2309-they represented , till the whole air was alive with roars and bleating and the hissing of snakes . This went on for a long time , till , getting tired of the pantomime , [I]0-i asked [Ayesha]114-ayesha if there would be any objection to [Leo]108-leo and [myself]0-i walking round to inspect the human torches , and , as [she]114-ayesha had nothing to say against it , [we]2304-we started , striking round to the left . After looking at one or two of the flaming bodies , [we]2304-we were about to return , thoroughly disgusted with the grotesque weirdness of the spectacle , when [our]2304-we attention was attracted by [one of [the dancers]4308-the dancers]2310-one of the dancers , a particularly active leopard , that had separated itself from its fellow - beasts , and was whisking about in [[our]2304-we immediate neighbourhood]2312-our immediate neighbourhood , but gradually drawing into a spot where the shadow was darkest , equidistant between two of [the flaming mummies]2313-the flaming mummies . Drawn by curiosity , [we]2304-we followed [it]2310-one of the dancers , when suddenly it darted past [us]2304-we into the shadows beyond , and as it did so erected itself and whispered , " Come , "[2310-one of the dancers] in a voice that [we]2304-we both recognised as that of [Ustane]172-ustane . Without waiting to consult [me]0-i [Leo]108-leo turned and followed [her]114-ayesha into the outer darkness , and [I]0-i , feeling sick enough at heart , went after [them]2314-them . The leopard crawled on for about fifty paces - a sufficient distance to be quite beyond the light of the fire and torches - and then [Leo]108-leo came up with it , or , rather , with [Ustane]172-ustane .

" Oh , [[my]114-ayesha lord]4128-my lord , "[114-ayesha] [I]0-i heard [her]114-ayesha whisper , ' so [I]0-i have found [thee]2315-thou ! Listen . [I]0-i am in peril of [my]0-i life from ' [She]114-ayesha - who - must - be - obeyed . ' Surely [the Baboon]3497-the baboon has told [thee]2315-thou how [she]3497-the baboon drove [me]0-i from [thee]2315-thou ? [I]0-i love [thee]2315-thou , [[my]0-i lord]4128-my lord , and [thou]2315-thou art [mine]0-i according to the custom of [the country]3308-the country . [I]0-i saved [thy]2315-thou life ! [[My]0-i Lion]2319-my lion , wilt [thou]2315-thou cast [me]0-i off now ? "[2315-thou]

" Of course not , "[108-leo] ejaculated [Leo]108-leo ; " [I]108-leo have been wondering whither [thou]2315-thou hadst gone . Let [us]4322-us go and explain matters to [the Queen]1108-the queen . "[108-leo]

" Nay , nay , [she]1108-the queen would slay [us]4322-us . [Thou]2315-thou knowest not [her]1108-the queen power - [the Baboon]180-the baboon there , [he]180-the baboon knoweth , for [he]180-the baboon saw . Nay , there is but one way : if [thou]2315-thou wilt cleave to [me]2315-thou , [thou]2315-thou must flee with [me]2315-thou across [the marshes]1130-the marshes even now , and then perchance [we]4322-us may escape . "[2315-thou]

" For Heaven 's sake , [Leo]108-leo , "[0-i] [I]0-i began , but [she]2320-she broke in -

" Nay , listen not to [him]2321-him . Swift - be swift - death is in the air [we]4322-us breathe . Even now , mayhap , [She]2320-she heareth [us]4322-us , "[2320-she] and without more ado [she]2320-she proceeded to back [her]2320-she arguments by throwing [herself]2320-she into [his]2321-him arms . As [she]2320-she did so the leopard 's head slipped from [her]2320-she hair , and [I]0-i saw the three white finger - marks upon it , gleaming faintly in the starlight . Once more realising the desperate nature of the position , [I]0-i was about to interpose , for [I]0-i knew that [Leo]108-leo was not too strong - minded where [women]327-women were concerned , when - oh ! horror ! - [I]0-i heard a little silvery laugh behind [me]0-i . [I]0-i turned round , and there was [She]2320-she [herself]2320-she , and with [her]2320-she [Billali]137-job and [two male mutes]2323-two male mutes . [I]0-i gasped and nearly sank to the ground , for [I]0-i knew that such a situation must result in some dreadful tragedy , of which it seemed exceedingly probable to [me]0-i that [I]0-i should be [the first victim]2324-the first victim . As for [Ustane]172-ustane , [she]2320-she untwined [her]2320-she arms and covered [her]2320-she eyes with [her]2320-she hands , while [Leo]108-leo , not knowing the full terror of the position , merely covered up , and looked as foolish as [a man caught in such a trap]2325-a man caught in such a trap would naturally do .

[XX

TRIUMPH]229-xx triumph

Then followed a moment of the most painful silence that [I]0-i ever endured . It was broken by [Ayesha]114-ayesha , who addressed [herself]114-ayesha to [Leo]108-leo .

" Nay , now , [[my]114-ayesha lord]4128-my lord and [guest]4326-guest , "[114-ayesha] [she]114-ayesha said in [her]114-ayesha softest tones , which yet had the ring of steel about them , " look not so bashful . Surely the sight was a pretty one - the leopard and the lion ! "[114-ayesha]

" Oh , hang it all ! "[108-leo] said [Leo]108-leo in English .

" And [thou]108-leo , [Ustane]172-ustane , "[114-ayesha] [she]114-ayesha went on , ' surely [I]0-i should have passed [thee]108-leo by , had not the light fallen on the white across [thy]108-leo hair , " and [she]114-ayesha pointed to the bright edge of the rising moon which was now appearing above the horizon . "[114-ayesha] Well ! well ! the dance is done - see , the tapers have burnt down , and all things end in silence and in ashes . So [thou]108-leo thoughtest it a fit time for love , [Ustane]172-ustane , [[my]0-i servant]3923-my servant - and [I]0-i , dreaming not that [I]0-i could be disobeyed , thought [thee]108-leo already far away . "[108-leo]

" Play not with [me]2327-the wretched woman , "[2327-the wretched woman] moaned [the wretched woman]2327-the wretched woman ; ' slay [me]0-i , and let there be an end . "[2327-the wretched woman]

" Nay , why ? It is not well to go so swift from the hot lips of love down to the cold mouth of the grave , "[114-ayesha] and [she]114-ayesha made a motion to [the mutes]1948-the mutes , who instantly stepped up and caught [the girl]3559-the girl by either arm . With an oath [Leo]108-leo sprang upon the nearest , and hurled [him]108-leo to the ground , and then stood over [him]108-leo with [his]108-leo face set , and [his]108-leo fist ready .

Again [Ayesha]114-ayesha laughed . " It was well thrown , [[my]114-ayesha guest]3916-my guest ; [thou]108-leo hast a strong arm for [one who so late was sick]4328-one who so late was sick . But now out of [thy]108-leo courtesy [I]114-ayesha pray [thee]108-leo let [that man]3474-that man live and do [my]114-ayesha bidding . [He]3474-that man shall not harm [the girl]3559-the girl ; the night air grows chill , and [I]114-ayesha would welcome [her]3559-the girl in [[mine]114-ayesha own place]4331-mine own place . Surely [she]3559-the girl whom [thou]108-leo dost favour shall be favoured of [me]114-ayesha also . "[114-ayesha]

[I]0-i took [Leo]108-leo by the arm , and pulled [him]108-leo from [the prostrate mute]2330-the prostrate mute , and [he]108-leo , half bewildered , obeyed the pressure . Then [we]2331-we all set out for [the cave across [the plateau]2333-the plateau]2332-the cave across the plateau , where a pile of white human ashes was all that remained of the fire that had lit the dancing , for [the dancers]4308-the dancers had vanished .

In due course [we]2331-we gained [Ayesha]114-ayesha 's boudoir - all too soon , it seemed to [me]0-i , having a sad presage of what was to come lying heavy on [my]0-i heart .

[Ayesha]114-ayesha seated [herself]114-ayesha upon [her]114-ayesha cushions , and , having dismissed [Job]137-job and [Billali]137-job , by signs bade [the mutes]1948-the mutes tend the lamps and retire - all save [one girl]2336-one girl , who was [[her]114-ayesha favourite personal attendant]2337-her favourite personal attendant . [We]2331-we three remained standing , the unfortunate Ustane a little to the left of [the rest of [us]2331-we]2338-the rest of us .

" Now , oh [Holly]109-holly , "[114-ayesha] [Ayesha]114-ayesha began , " how came it that [thou]4332-thou who didst hear [my]114-ayesha words bidding [this evil - doer]4333-this evil - doer "[114-ayesha] - and [she]114-ayesha pointed to [Ustane]172-ustane - " to go hence - [thou]4332-thou at whose prayer [I]114-ayesha did weakly spare [her]172-ustane life - how came it , [I]114-ayesha say , that [thou]4332-thou wast a sharer in what [I]114-ayesha saw to - night ? Answer , and for thine own sake , [I]114-ayesha say , speak all the truth , for [I]114-ayesha am not minded to hear lies upon this matter ! "[114-ayesha]

" It was by accident , [oh Queen]3645-oh queen , "[0-i] [I]0-i answered . " [I]0-i knew naught of it . "[0-i]

" [I]114-ayesha do believe [thee]0-i , oh [Holly]109-holly , "[114-ayesha] [she]114-ayesha answered coldly , " and well it is for [thee]0-i that [I]114-ayesha do - then does the whole guilt rest upon [her]172-ustane . "[114-ayesha]

" [I]108-leo do not find any guilt therein , "[108-leo] broke in [Leo]108-leo . " [She]172-ustane is not [[another man]4335-another man 's wife]4336-another man 's wife , and it appears that [she]172-ustane has married [me]108-leo according to the custom of this awful place , so who is the worse ? Any way , [madam]4337-madam , "[108-leo] [he]108-leo went on , " whatever [she]172-ustane has done [I]108-leo have done too , so if [she]172-ustane is to be punished let [me]108-leo be punished also ; and [I]108-leo tell [thee]4337-madam , "[108-leo] [he]108-leo went on , working [himself]108-leo up into a fury , " that if [thou]4337-madam biddest one of [those dead and dumb villains]4338-those dead and dumb villains to touch [her]172-ustane again [I]108-leo will tear [him]108-leo to pieces ! "[108-leo] And [he]108-leo looked as though [he]108-leo meant it .

[Ayesha]114-ayesha listened in icy silence , and made no remark . When [he]108-leo had finished , however , [she]114-ayesha addressed [Ustane]172-ustane .

" Hast [thou]4337-madam aught to say , [woman]3858-woman ? [Thou]4337-madam silly straw , [[thou]4337-madam feather , who didst think to float towards [thy]4337-madam passion 's petty ends , even against the great wind of [my]114-ayesha will]4340-thou feather , who didst think to float towards thy passion 's petty ends , even against the great wind of my will ! Tell [me]114-ayesha , for [I]114-ayesha fain would understand . Why didst [thou]4337-madam this thing ? "[114-ayesha]

And then [I]0-i think [I]0-i saw the most tremendous exhibition of moral courage and intrepidity that it is possible to conceive . For [the poor doomed girl]2339-the poor doomed girl , knowing what [she]2339-the poor doomed girl had to expect at the hands of [[her]2339-the poor doomed girl terrible Queen]2340-her terrible queen , knowing , too , from bitter experience , how great was [[her]2339-the poor doomed girl adversary]2341-her adversary 's power , yet gathered [herself]2339-the poor doomed girl together , and out of the very depths of [her]2339-the poor doomed girl despair drew materials to defy [her]2339-the poor doomed girl .

" [I]2339-the poor doomed girl did it , oh [She]2340-her terrible queen , "[2339-the poor doomed girl] [she]2339-the poor doomed girl answered , drawing [herself]2339-the poor doomed girl up to the full of [her]2339-the poor doomed girl stately height , and throwing back the panther skin from [her]2339-the poor doomed girl head , " because [my]2339-the poor doomed girl love is stronger than the grave . [I]2339-the poor doomed girl did it because [my]2339-the poor doomed girl life without [this man whom [my]2339-the poor doomed girl heart chose]4341-this man whom my heart chose would be but a living death . Therefore did [I]2339-the poor doomed girl risk [my]2339-the poor doomed girl life , and , now that [I]2339-the poor doomed girl know that it is forfeit to thine anger , yet am [I]2339-the poor doomed girl glad that [I]2339-the poor doomed girl did risk it , and pay it away in the risking , ay , because [he]4341-this man whom my heart chose embraced [me]2339-the poor doomed girl once , and told [me]2339-the poor doomed girl that [he]4341-this man whom my heart chose loved [me]2339-the poor doomed girl yet . "[2339-the poor doomed girl]

Here [Ayesha]114-ayesha half rose from [her]114-ayesha couch , and then sank down again .

" [I]172-ustane have no magic , "[172-ustane] went on [Ustane]172-ustane , [her]172-ustane rich voice ringing strong and full , " and [I]172-ustane am not [a Queen]1102-a queen , nor do [I]172-ustane live for ever , but [a woman]284-a woman 's heart is heavy to sink through waters , however deep , oh [Queen]189-queen ! and [a woman]284-a woman 's eyes are quick to see - even through [thy]284-a woman veil , oh Queen ![172-ustane]

" Listen : [I]2342-i know it , [thou]284-a woman dost love [this man]4214-this man thyself , and therefore wouldst [thou]284-a woman destroy [me]2342-i who stand across [thy]284-a woman path . Ay , [I]2342-i die - [I]2342-i die , and go into the darkness , nor know [I]2342-i whither [I]2342-i go . But this [I]2342-i know . There is a light shining in [my]2342-i breast , and by that light , as by a lamp , [I]2342-i see the truth , and the future that [I]2342-i shall not share unroll itself before [me]2342-i like a scroll . When first [I]2342-i knew [[my]2342-i lord]4128-my lord , "[2342-i] and [she]2342-i pointed to [Leo]108-leo , " [I]2342-i knew also that death would be the bridal gift [he]108-leo gave [me]2342-i - it rushed upon [me]2342-i of a sudden , but [I]2342-i turned not back , being ready to pay the price , and , behold , death is here ! And now , even as [I]2342-i knew that , so do [I]2342-i , standing on the steps of doom , know that [thou]4347-thee shalt not reap the profit of [thy]4347-thee crime . [Mine]2342-i [he]108-leo is , and , though [thy]4347-thee beauty shine like a sun among the stars , [mine]2342-i shall [he]108-leo remain for [thee]4347-thee . Never here in this life shall [he]108-leo look [thee]4347-thee in the eyes and call [thee]4347-thee spouse . [Thou]4347-thee too art doomed , [I]2342-i see "[2342-i] - and [her]2343-her voice rang like the cry of [an inspired prophetess]2344-an inspired prophetess ; " ah , [I]2343-her see - - "[2343-her]

Then came an answering cry of mingled rage and terror . [I]0-i turned [my]0-i head . [Ayesha]114-ayesha had risen , and was standing with [her]114-ayesha outstretched hand pointing at [Ustane]172-ustane , who had suddenly stopped speaking . [I]0-i gazed at [the poor woman]2345-the poor woman , and as [I]0-i gazed there came upon [her]2345-the poor woman face that same woeful , fixed expression of terror that [I]0-i had seen once before when [she]2345-the poor woman had broken out into [her]2345-the poor woman wild chant . [Her]2345-the poor woman eyes grew large , [her]2345-the poor woman nostrils dilated , and [her]2345-the poor woman lips blanched .

[Ayesha]114-ayesha said nothing , [she]2345-the poor woman made no sound , [she]2345-the poor woman only drew [herself]2345-the poor woman up , stretched out [her]2345-the poor woman arm , and , [her]2345-the poor woman tall veiled frame quivering like an aspen leaf , appeared to look fixedly at [[her]2345-the poor woman victim]1219-her victim . Even as [she]2345-the poor woman did so [Ustane]172-ustane put [her]172-ustane hands to [her]172-ustane head , uttered one piercing scream , turned round twice , and then fell backwards with a thud - prone upon the floor . Both [Leo]108-leo and [myself]0-i rushed to [her]2345-the poor woman - [she]2345-the poor woman was stone dead - blasted into death by some mysterious electric agency or overwhelming will - force whereof the dread [She]2345-the poor woman had command .

For a moment [Leo]108-leo did not quite realise what had happened . But , when [he]108-leo did , [his]108-leo face was awful to see . With a savage oath [he]108-leo rose from beside the corpse , and , turning , literally sprang at [Ayesha]114-ayesha . But [she]2345-the poor woman was watching , and , seeing [him]108-leo come , stretched out [her]2345-the poor woman hand again , and [he]108-leo went staggering back towards [me]0-i , and would have fallen , had [I]0-i not caught [him]108-leo . Afterwards [he]108-leo told [me]0-i that [he]108-leo felt as though [he]108-leo had suddenly received a violent blow in the chest , and , what is more , utterly cowed , as if all the manhood had been taken out of [him]108-leo .

Then [Ayesha]114-ayesha spoke . " Forgive [me]2345-the poor woman , [[my]2345-the poor woman guest]3916-my guest , "[2345-the poor woman] [she]2345-the poor woman said softly , addressing [him]108-leo , " if [I]2345-the poor woman have shocked [thee]108-leo with [my]2345-the poor woman justice . "[2345-the poor woman]

" Forgive [thee]2345-the poor woman , [[thou]2345-the poor woman fiend]4349-thou fiend , "[108-leo] roared poor [Leo]108-leo , wringing [his]108-leo hands in [his]108-leo rage and grief . " Forgive [thee]2345-the poor woman , [thou]2345-the poor woman murderess ! By [Heaven]212-heaven , [I]2345-the poor woman will kill [thee]2345-the poor woman if [I]2345-the poor woman can ! "[2345-the poor woman]

" Nay , nay , "[2345-the poor woman] [she]2345-the poor woman answered in the same soft voice , " [thou]2345-the poor woman dost not understand - the time has come for [thee]2345-the poor woman to learn . [Thou]2345-the poor woman art [my]2345-the poor woman love , [[my]2345-the poor woman Kallikrates]4350-my kallikrates , [[my]2345-the poor woman Beautiful]4351-my beautiful , [[my]2345-the poor woman Strong]4352-my strong ! For two thousand years , [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates , have [I]2345-the poor woman waited for [thee]2347-thee , and now at length [thou]2345-the poor woman hast come back to [me]2345-the poor woman ; and as for [this woman]1714-this woman , "[2345-the poor woman] pointing to the corpse , ' [she]2345-the poor woman stood between [me]0-i and [thee]2347-thee , and therefore have [I]0-i laid [her]2345-the poor woman in the dust , [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates . "[0-i]

" It is an accursed lie ! "[108-leo] said [Leo]108-leo . " [My]108-leo name is not [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates ! [I]108-leo am [Leo Vincey]108-leo ; [[my]108-leo ancestor]3074-my ancestor was [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates - at least , [I]108-leo believe [he]3074-my ancestor was . "[108-leo]

" Ah , [thou]2345-the poor woman sayest it - [thine ancestor]4355-thine ancestor was [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates , and [thou]2345-the poor woman , even [thou]2345-the poor woman , art [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates reborn , come back - and [[mine]108-leo own dear lord]4356-mine own dear lord ! "[0-i]

" [I]108-leo am not [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates , and , as for being [[thy]2345-the poor woman lord]4357-thy lord , or having aught to do with [thee]2345-the poor woman , [I]108-leo had sooner be [the lord of [a fiend from hell]4359-a fiend from hell]4358-the lord of a fiend from hell , for [she]4359-a fiend from hell would be better than [thou]2345-the poor woman . "[108-leo]

" Sayest [thou]2345-the poor woman so - sayest [thou]2345-the poor woman so , [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates ? Nay , but [thou]2345-the poor woman hast not seen [me]0-i for so long a time that no memory remains . Yet am [I]0-i very fair , [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates ! "[0-i]

" [I]108-leo hate [thee]2345-the poor woman , murderess , and [I]108-leo have no wish to see [thee]2345-the poor woman . What is it to [me]108-leo how fair [thou]2345-the poor woman art ? [I]108-leo hate [thee]2345-the poor woman , [I]108-leo say . "[108-leo]

" Yet within a very little space shalt [thou]2345-the poor woman creep to [my]114-ayesha knee , and swear that [thou]2345-the poor woman dost love [me]114-ayesha , "[114-ayesha] answered [Ayesha]114-ayesha , with a sweet , mocking laugh . " Come , there is no time like the present time , here before [this dead girl who loved [thee]2345-the poor woman]4360-this dead girl who loved thee , let [us]4361-us put it to the proof .[114-ayesha]

" Look now on [me]114-ayesha , [Kallikrates]118-kallikrates !
